name: Dashing Ball (mwn02)
description:
You control a dashing ball.

This game was made for the Newbies Game Jam (2022-1) with the theme "minimalist".

  • Aim with the mouse
  • Left click to dash
  • Right click to change direction

The bar on the top tells you if you can move or not, so if the bar is at 0, you need to wait until it gets to 1 to dash. The bars goes down to zero when you dash but you don't kill enemies.

Share your score!!
